historical_summary: Xavier has shown a growing interest in finance and trading, particularly in cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology. He has been actively engaging with market trends, researching trading strategies, and even considering dropping out of college to pursue a career in quant trading. His passion for technology is evident in his exploration of AI pair programming tools for coding and his intrigue with the potential of blockchain in various applications.
upcoming: Quant Trading Start: Xavier will begin his role at the quant firm next week, focusing on developing and refining trading algorithms with AI pair programming tools to enhance efficiency and accuracy.

Blockchain and Crypto Exploration: He plans to deepen his understanding of blockchain technology, possibly experimenting with decentralized finance (DeFi) projects or creating a small-scale project to showcase his skills.
Professional Networking: Xavier will attend industry meetups and conferences to expand his network, aiming to connect with professionals in the blockchain and finance sectors.

historical_summary: Xavier has been navigating the complexities of college life, balancing academic pressure with social interactions. He's shown interest in personal growth, from considering psychedelics for self-knowledge to expressing a desire to improve his social life and relationships.
upcoming: Exploration of Psychedelics: He might engage in discussions or experiences with psychedelics to explore consciousness, potentially leading to personal insights or creative breakthroughs.
Relationship Building: Xavier plans to be more proactive in his dating life, using his new-found confidence from his professional achievements to engage more socially.
Travel and Leisure: Following his trip to Bangkok, Xavier might plan more short trips or local adventures to maintain a balance between work and personal life.

historical_summary: Xavier maintains regular contact with his family, sharing his tech stories and life updates, although he has kept some of his recent decisions like considering dropping out of college under wraps.
upcoming: Communication: He will continue regular calls with his parents, discussing his new job and experiences in quant trading, ensuring they feel included in his life journey.
Family Events: Xavier might plan a visit home or invite his family to visit him in NYC, perhaps to celebrate his new job or a milestone event.
Support: He will seek advice from his family on managing work-life balance, leveraging their experiences.

historical_summary: Xavier has built a network through college, but he's also expressed a sense of disconnection and has been somewhat selective about social interactions.
upcoming: Crypto Community Involvement: He will join crypto meetups and engage more with the online trading community, fostering relationships that align with his career interests.
Reconnecting: Xavier plans to reconnect with old friends, possibly organizing a meet-up or attending events where he might run into them.
New Friendships: With his new job and social activities, he anticipates forming new connections that share his professional and personal interests.

historical_summary: Xavier has been reflecting on his path, questioning traditional routes, and considering the impact of technology on his future and society at large.
upcoming: Future of Technology: He will continue to explore and reflect on emerging technologies like decentralized energy grids, contemplating their potential impact on society and his career.
Personal Growth: Xavier might journal or blog about his experiences and insights, using these reflections to guide his career and personal decisions.

Philosophical Considerations: He will delve into philosophical discussions about reality, consciousness, and the implications of living in a technologically-driven world, possibly influencing his future tech-related endeavors.
